message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $15,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $10,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit from my initial offer. How about $13,000? It's a fair price considering the value of the product to you.

I understand you're willing to come down from your initial offer, but $13,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my original offer and your new offer. How about $11,500?

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,500 is still a little low for me.  I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers. How about $12,250? That way we both get a good deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet us in the middle, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $12,000. Would you be willing to come down to $12,000, and we can call it a day?
